title: [Question] Rate difficulty of subjects (2nd Years)
content:
How would you rank the difficulty of 2nd-year subjects? My friends and I all have different opinions, so I wanted to hear yours {DDCO,DSA,MCSE,WT,AFLL}  
(i just wanna decide what to prioritize)

comments.body: I would rank them as : DDCO DSA WT AFLL MCSE (from hardest to easiest )
You're insane for calling dsa the second hardest
No, I’m not insane but rather weak at DSA. This is just my personal ranking yk
So wt is that hard huh Even I felt the same after facing the ball isa and ddco was tough
